Comments.Message:
Hello,
I can confirm this error cause I have the same problem with my warrior since 4.1.03 (I think). Just every time I want to go to the Metagem tab Rawr crashes.

I tryed to attach my character file to confirm this issue but I cannot save my character directly after loaded him from the armory (a strange error pops up). But you can rebuild the error by loading my character (EU/Alleria/Bastiboy) from the armory und try to open the metagem tab.
And now with my the character file
This doesn't repro on my Dev build in Debug or Release mode, but it repro on the released package. It appears to have been fixed
Yes, I believe I fixed whatever was causing this with my recent check-in, as when I went to repro it last week I couldn't do so.
Ive added in attach file my character file
